message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You could have had more, now it's my turn to make the offer
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to be too generous
You're not being very generous, I'll have to take more
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting everything
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving in yet
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of
You're running out of time, I'm not budging
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going down without a fight
It's now or never, take it or leave it
I'll take what's left, it's the best I can do
Last chance, take it or we both walk away with nothing
